secondText: My First Game I Made On My Own Before Starting School
Another Game I Made As A Remake From A Class In High School
A Game I Made For A Game Jam On Itch.io Called The Tri-Jam Where You Make A Game In 3 Hours
A Rythem Based Boss Fighting Game (In Development)
